label: Inverter-inator 3000
description: Dr. Doofenshmirtz is a little cheater and created the Inverter-inator 3000 to switch the opponent's keys! It's a little bit unfair, but it's fun!

label: Fireball-Cannon
description: When the Fireball-Cannon hits the ball, it will pick it up and you'll be able to shoot it. It will go super fast!!!

label: Artic Freeze
description: When you shoot this little bit of our home against the opponent, it will slow down his movement. If you hit him twice in a row, he will be frozen for a few seconds!

label: Bubble Trouble
description: Shoot the bubble against the ball and make your opponent's life a trouble. It will also give a liiittle speed to the ball!

label: Bro Casper
description: If you shoot Casper against anything he'll ghost it, like your last ex! (eue)
